title: Pink and red dresses won the 2019 Emmys purple carpet
text:
Pink and red gowns dominated the purple carpet at the 2019 Emmy Awards.

The bright color combination showed up on everyone from "Empire" star Taraji P. Henson to singer Mandy Moore, and several others.

Moore posted a fun photo on Instagram alongside "This Is Us" co-star Susan Kelechi Watson, who also wore the punchy hues.

"Always happy to be here and twinning with my girl @susankelechiwatson," she wrote in a caption.

This year's carpet got a Valentine's Day-themed twist with these matchy-matchy looks.

Scroll ahead for a closer look at the trendiest color-blocked looks of the night.

Taraji P. Henson

Kevin Mazur/Getty Images

Henson looked angelic in her sheer Vera Wang look that also featured an alluring deep-V plunging neckline.

Mandy Moore

Frazer Harrison/Getty Images

Moore wore an amazing off-the-shoulder look from Brandon Maxwell.

Susan Kelechi Watson

Christopher Polk/Variety/REX

Watson was picture perfect in her floor-sweeping gown that was laced with gorgeous powder-pink puffy sleeves.

Marisa Tomei

Valerie Macon/AFP/Getty Images

We can't get enough of this ruched gown paired perfectly with metallic pumps.

Zoe Kazan

Jeff Kravitz/FilmMagic/Getty Images

Kazan wore a stylish version of the colors that also included black outer panels and a beautiful bow tie at the center.
description: Several celebrities wore pink and red dresses at for the 2019 Emmy Awards. See them all here.
